definition: (lit. quantity of spirit)/moral character/degree of forbearance/broad-mindedness or otherwise/tolerance/magnanimity
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Drying machine and the capacity of filter should be consistent with the displacement compressors.
sentences.chinese: 乾燥機及過濾器的處理量應與壓縮機的排氣量相一致。

sentences.english: II. In case the gas quantity of users are reduced in breach of the provisions of contracts.
sentences.chinese: 不按合同規定，自行減少或剋扣用戶氣量。

sentences.english: If I were an accountant, I would try my best not to be small-minded.
sentences.chinese: 如果我是個會計，我就不會顯得那麼氣量小。

sentences.english: According to different air supply, there is a critical value to separated effect of separator.
sentences.chinese: 分離器分離效果隨供氣量的變化存在臨界值。

sentences.english: Capacity of air separation plant shall be designed for air amount being supplied to all production plants at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 空分裝置的建設規模應考慮所有裝置同時的用氣量。

sentences.english: Bakelite handle, fine heat-resistance , handy, convenient, large quantity of steam.
sentences.chinese: 膠木手柄，耐溫性好，輕巧方便，氣量大。

sentences.english: The salt-removing effect during formation of gas hydrate was dominated by methane consumption.
sentences.chinese: 水合物生成引起的排鹽效應主要取決於耗氣量。

sentences.english: Objective To study the therapeutic and protective effect of low tidal volume(LTV) ventilation in children with acute respiratory failure.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討小潮氣量機械通氣的臨牀治療及肺保護效果。

sentences.english: And blowers are chosen according to calculation of air volume and total pressure loss.
sentences.chinese: 風機根據計算空氣量和總壓力損失的數值進行選擇。

sentences.english: The reduction of car exhaust is good for all mankind.
sentences.chinese: 降低汽車的排氣量是爲了全人類的福祉。

sentences.english: Narrow-mindedness is an old weakness of mine.
sentences.chinese: 氣量狹窄是我的老毛病。

sentences.english: Then, static is an important aspect of gas.
sentences.chinese: 那麼，靜就是氣量的一個重要方面。

sentences.english: Under normal circumstances, the option for the displacement capacity of 20% of the gas tank.
sentences.chinese: 一般情況下，可選擇容量爲排氣量20%的儲氣罐。

sentences.english: Any new recommendations in regards to ventilation tidal volume?
sentences.chinese: 關於機械通氣潮氣量的新建議是什麼？

sentences.english: Can fall in demand, without which all machine all open.
sentences.chinese: 能在需求供氣量下降時，無需所有機器全部開啓。

sentences.english: That will reduce carbon dioxide emissions by about 500 pounds per year.
sentences.chinese: 這樣子每年可以再減少約500磅的二氧化碳排氣量。

definition: to pile up/to accumulate without being dealt with
sum (result of addition)/addition/total/to add up a number of items/to accumulate
when things reach an extreme, they can only move in the opposite direction (idiom)
